name: UI: 'Use secret text(s) or file(s)' checkbox is selected and config can be saved
description: Assert checkbox is selected, click Save, verify redirect to Project page

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.

Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

testStage.description: Assert checkbox is selected, click Save, verify redirect to Project page

steps.name: Assert 'Use secret text(s) or file(s)' checkbox is selected
Click Save and wait for Project page
Click the button 'Save' to save "MyProject" project and go to project page
Verify redirect to Project page (not /configure)
